mode.name: profile_overview
mode.query: SELECT SP.ID, SP.NAME, C.name CHANNEL_NAME, TO_CHAR(SP.created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED FROM rhnChannel C, rhnServerProfile SP WHERE SP.org_id = :org_id AND SP.base_channel = C.id AND SP.profile_type_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnServerProfileType WHERE label = 'normal') ORDER BY UPPER(SP.name)

mode.name: profile_package_overview
mode.query: SELECT PN.name || '-' || PE.evr.as_vre_simple() AS NVRE, PA.label as arch FROM rhnServerProfilePackage SPP LEFT JOIN rhnPackageArch PA ON SPP.package_arch_id = PA.id INNER JOIN rhnPackageName PN ON SPP.name_id = PN.id INNER JOIN rhnPackageEVR PE ON SPP.evr_id = PE.id WHERE SPP.server_profile_id = :prid ORDER BY UPPER(PN.name), PE.evr

mode.name: compatible_with_channel
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT SP.id, SP.name FROM rhnServerProfile SP, rhnServerProfileType SPT WHERE SP.org_id = :org_id AND SP.base_channel = :cid AND SPT.id = SP.profile_type_id AND SPT.label = 'normal' ORDER BY SP.name

write-mode.name: insert_package_profile
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnServerProfilePackage (server_profile_id, name_id, evr_id, package_arch_id) SELECT DISTINCT :prid, SP.name_id, SP.evr_id, SP.package_arch_id FROM rhnServerPackage SP WHERE SP.server_id = :sid
